alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Grant; Hooker (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:06PM CDT until June 29 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Grant County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 806 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Medicine Lake to 32 miles northwest of Mullen to 22 miles northeast of Hyannis to near Whitman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Whitman, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Marsh Flat, Speckel Meir Lake, Duluth, Hire, Indian Hill, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek, Sevenmile Hill, Hecla and Weir. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 148 and 180. Highway 61 near mile marker 156. Highway 97 between mile markers 75 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
